attributes.action: Take UAE of the red list,if people can watch football without masks,let us home
attributes.additional_details:
I am a student and I have been stuck in the UAE with no salary since December. Please let me
come home . Please remove UAE of the red route.
attributes.background: If you can let people watch football with no masks on then let your people come back home, it’s ridiculous that hundreds of thousands of people in the UK can get away free but you wont let your own innocent residents back that are stuck in the UAE where we can’t even get vaccinated. Let us home.
